pages.text: Artificial life is a type of synthesized life that contains a spirit crystal within itself. It can use magick context to cast magick, and using magick context on artificial life can store them within it. Right-clicking while sneaking can clear the magick context.

Artificial life must be placed on the ground to function and can be activated using red-stone signals, causing it to cast the magick context stored within it. Continuous red-stone signals will keep the artificial life activated, with stronger signals causing it to cast spells slower and weaker signals causing it to cast spells faster. Artificial life does not regenerate its own mana energy and still has a mana limit of 5000, but it can absorb mana from Mana Capacity in the surrounding area.
